head.title: Aunt Ruth Packard's Potato Chip Cookies

directions.step:
Heat oven to 350 degrees. Mix margarine and sugar and vanilla. Add crushed potato chips and nuts mixed with flour. Roll into balls about the size of a walnut and place on ungreased cookie sheet. Flatten down with a glass that has been dipped into sugar. Bake for 14-16 minutes. Makes approximately 5 dozen cookies
